snippet: Bjarne Melgaard, known to ignore boundaries, is using his exhibition at Luxembourg & Dayan to promote “A New Novel by Bjarne Melgaard.”
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews works by Bjarne Melgaard at Luxembourg & Dayan gallery.
lead_paragraph: Bjarne Melgaard, known to ignore boundaries, is using his exhibition at Luxembourg & Dayan to promote “A New Novel by Bjarne Melgaard.”
